title: Mum’s everyday fish pie with cheese mash
description: Fish pie is one of The Hairy Bikers' favourite comfort foods, perfect for busy weekdays or lazy weekends. You could make the pie in advance and bake it just before serving.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz thick white fish fillets, preferably cod, haddock or pollock, skinned
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
800g/1lb 12oz medium potatoes, peeled and cut into quarters
